001package gbw.melange.common.shading.constants;
002
003public enum ShaderDefs {
004    /**
005     * Fragment shaders may as part of a chain, or not, sample from a previous fragment shader output.
006     * If a previous output is to be taken into account, this definition is present.
007     */
008    HAS_INPUT_TEXTURE("HAS_INPUT_TEXTURE");
009
010    public final String defName;
011    ShaderDefs(String defName){
012        this.defName = defName;
013    }
014
015}
